Description.Text: In the Levantine city, which combines history, spirituality and modernity, a bridge between East and West, was born on Boscolo Bari on the central waterfront Nazario Sauro. First and only 5 star hotel in town is the new destination of luxury. Located in the chic and popular of Bari, not far from the Basilica di San Nicola, Bari Boscolo redefines the waterfront with a new image of Bari, bringing to life the legendary Grand Hotel Nations, thanks to a facelift that combines the original charm of its glorious past with the latest trends in contemporary luxury lifestyle. The Boscolo Bari is proposed as a new landmark of the city, with a strong visual impact of proposed accommodation over six floors topped by a spectacular terrace overlooking the sea and the swimming pool: 115 rooms, including one Presidential Suite and 2 of 120 metriquadrati Executive Suite, 2 exclusive restaurants, meeting rooms and a beauty farm with sea view gym inside. Its historic roots of the agora that elects ideal location for exclusive events and meeting place, is reflected in the direct Nazario Sauro promenade through a luminous compass glass that opens in the lobby area with a strong visual impact, which also involves reception and restaurant. The game's water fountain with a waterfall, the colors of the sea and the sun heat the wood paneling on the walls, the house of the stylized lobby that recalls the historic boats of the fishermen, the game of huge tents that are reminiscent of theatrical sets, homage Bari recalling precisely the element of water, the rite of navigation inherent in this people called 'navigators', Teatro Petruzzelli.

Classic Room - Nothing was left to chance in planning and design. The furnishings are characterized by linear forms and whimsical colors that give such an old building, a sense of liveliness downplaying the severity of the past. Each room has telephone, shower or views of the room, minibar, safe, wifi, LCD TV. Classic Room offers one Double bed.
Superior Room - Large rooms equipped with every comfort in which the choice of materials creates new combinations of surfaces and bright chromatic harmony is enhanced by the colors of the sea can be seen from the large windows. Each room has telephone, minibar, safe, wifi, LCD TV.
Deluxe Room - Luxurious rooms overlooking the sea where comfort and excellent services are combined with the elegance of the furniture design. The shades of blue reminiscent of orange and Mediterranean landscapes, creating a unified overview. The stained glass windows decorated with the 'Plantae' stylized divide the bedroom from the bathroom decorated with marble colored sand.
